public ref class SelectedDatesCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type SelectedDatesCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的选定日期。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects that represent the selected dates in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以编程方式管理一系列对象表示中的选定的日期控件。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the selected dates in a control. 此类通常用于添加或从集合中移除日期。This class is commonly used to add or remove dates from the collection. 此集合将存储完整的日期。This collection stores only whole dates. 每个时间部分中删除。The time portion of each is removed. 日期升序存储。The dates are stored in ascending order. 如果存在重复的日期，只有一个日期存储在集合中。If there are duplicate dates, only one date is stored in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用类，以选择中的日期控件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically use the class to select dates in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An -implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建-实现对象，它可以轻松地循环访问获取每个项集合。Use this method to create an -implemented object that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the collection. 使用指向当前获取项的属性的集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法以将枚举数移回初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 方法需要在创建后调用-实现对象或使用方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项。The method needs to be called after creating an -implemented object or using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来创建的实现的对象，该循环以显示所选的日期的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an -implemented object that is iterated through to display the selected dates from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
